verses.verse: A good name <S%H8034><s%> is rather to be chosen <S%H977><s%> than great <S%H7227><s%> riches <S%H6239><s%>, And loving <S%H2896><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> rather than silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%>.
The rich <S%H6223><s%> and the poor <S%H7326><s%> meet together <S%H6298><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is the maker of them all <S%H6213><s%>.
A prudent <S%H6175><s%> man seeth <S%H7200><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%>, and hideth <S%H5641><s%> himself <S%H6612><s%>; But the simple pass on <S%H5674><s%>, and suffer for it <S%H6064><s%>.
The reward <S%H6118><s%> of humility <S%H6038><s%> and the fear <S%H3374><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> Is riches <S%H6239><s%>, and honor <S%H3519><s%>, and life <S%H2416><s%>.
Thorns <S%H6791><s%> and snares <S%H6341><s%> are in the way <S%H1870><s%> of the perverse <S%H6141><s%>: He that keepeth <S%H8104><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be far from them <S%H7368><s%>.
Train up <S%H2596><s%> a child <S%H5288><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> he should go <S%H6310><s%>, And even when he is old <S%H2204><s%> he will not depart from it <S%H5493><s%>.
The rich <S%H6223><s%> ruleth <S%H4910><s%> over the poor <S%H7326><s%>; And the borrower <S%H3867><s%> is servant <S%H5650><s%> to the lender <S%H376><s%>.
He that soweth <S%H2232><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%> shall reap <S%H7114><s%> calamity <S%H205><s%>; And the rod <S%H7626><s%> of his wrath <S%H5678><s%> shall fail <S%H3615><s%>.
He that hath a bountiful <S%H2896><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%>; For he giveth <S%H5414><s%> of his bread <S%H3899><s%> to the poor <S%H1800><s%>.
Cast out <S%H1644><s%> the scoffer <S%H3887><s%>, and contention <S%H4066><s%> will go out <S%H3318><s%>; Yea <S%H1779><s%>, strife and ignominy <S%H7036><s%> will cease <S%H7673><s%>.
He that loveth <S%H157><s%> pureness <S%H2890><s%> of heart <S%H3820><s%>, For the grace <S%H2580><s%> of his lips <S%H8193><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> will be his friend <S%H7453><s%>.

The eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> preserve <S%H5341><s%> him that hath knowledge <S%H1847><s%>; But he overthroweth <S%H5557><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the treacherous man <S%H898><s%>.
The sluggard <S%H6102><s%> saith <S%H559><s%>, There is a lion <S%H738><s%> without <S%H2351><s%>: I shall be slain <S%H7523><s%> in <S%H8432><s%> the streets <S%H7339><s%>.
The mouth <S%H6310><s%> of strange women <S%H2114><s%> is a deep <S%H6013><s%> pit <S%H7745><s%>: He that is abhorred <S%H2194><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall fall therein <S%H5307><s%>.

Foolishness <S%H200><s%> is bound <S%H7194><s%> up in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of a child <S%H5288><s%>; But the rod <S%H7626><s%> of correction <S%H4148><s%> shall drive it far from him <S%H7368><s%>.
He that oppresseth <S%H6231><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%> to increase <S%H7235><s%> his gain <S%H5414><s%>, And he that giveth to the rich <S%H6223><s%>, shall come only to want <S%H4270><s%>.
Incline <S%H5186><s%> thine ear <S%H241><s%>, and hear <S%H241><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%>, And apply <S%H7896><s%> thy heart <S%H3820><s%> unto my knowledge <S%H1847><s%>.
For it is a pleasant thing <S%H5273><s%> if thou keep <S%H8104><s%> them within <S%H990><s%> thee <S%H3559><s%>, If they be established together <S%H3162><s%> upon thy lips <S%H8193><s%>.
That thy trust <S%H4009><s%> may be in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, I have made them known <S%H3045><s%> to thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, even to thee.
Have not I written <S%H3789><s%> unto thee <S%H8032><s%> excellent things <S%H7991><s%> Of counsels <S%H4156><s%> and knowledge <S%H1847><s%>,

To make thee know <S%H3045><s%> the certainty <S%H7189><s%> of the words <S%H561><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%>, That thou mayest carry <S%H7725><s%> back words <S%H561><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> to them that send thee <S%H7971><s%>?
Rob <S%H1497><s%> not the poor <S%H1800><s%>, because he is poor <S%H1800><s%>; Neither oppress <S%H1792><s%> the afflicted <S%H6041><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%>:
For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will plead <S%H7378><s%> their cause <S%H7379><s%>, And despoil <S%H6906><s%> of life <S%H5315><s%> those that despoil them <S%H6906><s%>.
Make no friendship <S%H7462><s%> with a man <S%H1167><s%> that is given to anger <S%H639><s%>; And with a wrathful <S%H2534><s%> man <S%H376><s%> thou shalt not go <S%H935><s%>:
Lest thou learn <S%H502><s%> this ways <S%H734><s%>, And get <S%H3947><s%> a snare <S%H4170><s%> to thy soul <S%H5315><s%>.
Be thou not one of them that strike <S%H8628><s%> hands <S%H3709><s%>, Or of them that are sureties <S%H6148><s%> for debts <S%H4859><s%>.
If thou hast not wherewith to pay <S%H7999><s%>, Why should he take away <S%H3947><s%> thy bed from under thee <S%H4904><s%>?
Remove <S%H5253><s%> not the ancient <S%H5769><s%> landmark <S%H1366><s%>, Which thy fathers <S%H1><s%> have set <S%H6213><s%>.

Seest <S%H2372><s%> thou a man <S%H376><s%> diligent <S%H4106><s%> in his business <S%H4399><s%>? he shall stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%>; He shall not stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> mean men <S%H2823><s%>.
